feed.title: Track Awesome Nlg Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of resources dedicated to Natural Language Generation (NLG)

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Mar 12, 2023
entry.content:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • lightnlg (⭐3) - A minimalistic codebase for finetuning and interacting with NLG models using PyTorch Lightning.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 18, 2023
entry.content:
Libraries

  • Writebot - A NodeJS library that makes it easier to use GPT-3 by using presets.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Mar 23, 2022
entry.content:
Papers and Articles

  • 2022: Repairing the Cracked Foundation: A Survey of Obstacles in Evaluation Practices for Generated Text

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Apr 16, 2021
entry.content:
Datasets

  • WikiBio - wikipedia biography dataset - This dataset gathers 728,321 biographies from wikipedia. It aims at evaluating text generation algorithms.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Mar 25, 2021
entry.content:
Papers and Articles

  • 2021: Vision: NLG Can Help Humanise Data and AI

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Feb 03, 2021
entry.content:
Evaluation

  • GEM - a benchmark environment for NLG with a focus on its Evaluation, both through human annotations and automated Metrics.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 21, 2021
entry.content:
Evaluation

  • BLEURT: a Transfer Learning-Based Metric for Natural Language Generation (⭐739)

Papers and Articles

  • 2020: The Curious Case of Neural Text Degeneration

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 27, 2020
entry.content:
Papers and Articles

  • 2020: A Gold Standard Methodology for Evaluating Accuracy in Data-To-Text Systems

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 23, 2020
entry.content:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • PaperRobot: Incremental Draft Generation of Scientific Ideas (⭐479) - We present a PaperRobot who performs as an automatic research assistant.
  • Question Generation using hugstransformers (⭐1.1k) - Question generation is the task of automatically generating questions from a text paragraph.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 13, 2020
entry.content:
Papers and Articles

  • 2020: Evaluating the state-of-the-art of End-to-End Natural Language Generation: The E2E NLG challenge

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jun 16, 2020
entry.content:
Papers and Articles

  • 2020: How to generate text: using different decoding methods for language generation with Transformers
  • 2020: Natural language generation: The commercial state ofthe art in 2020
  • 2020: Turing-NLG: A 17-billion-parameter language model by Microsoft
  • 2019: A Closer Look at Recent Results of Verb Selection for Data-to-Text NLG
  • 2019: A Personalized Data-to-Text Support Tool for Cancer Patients
  • 2019: Controlling Contents in Data-to-Document Generation with Human-Designed Topic Labels
  • 2019: Generated Texts Must Be Accurate!
  • 2019: Hotel Scribe: Generating High Variation Hotel Descriptions
  • 2019: Revisiting Challenges in Data-to-Text Generation with Fact Grounding
  • 2017: Survey of the State of the Art in NaturalLanguage Generation: Core tasks, applicationsand evaluation
  • 2016: Natural Language Generation enhances human decision-making with uncertain information

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on May 26, 2020
entry.content:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • This Word Does Not Exist (⭐1k) - This is a project allows people to train a variant of GPT-2 that makes up words, definitions and examples from scratch.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on May 21, 2020
entry.content:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • aitextgen (⭐1.8k) - A robust Python tool for text-based AI training and generation using GPT-2.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on May 16, 2020
entry.content:
Datasets

  • The Schema-Guided Dialogue Dataset (⭐575) - The Schema-Guided Dialogue (SGD) dataset consists of over 20k annotated multi-domain, task-oriented conversations between a human and a virtual assistant.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Apr 26, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries

  • Number Words (⭐199) - Convert a number to an approximated text expression: from '0.23' to 'less than a quarter'.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Apr 09, 2020
entry.content:
Products

  • RosaeNLG - An open-source library for node.js or client side (browser) execution, based on the Pug template engine, to generate texts in English, French, German and Italian.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Mar 07, 2020
entry.content:
Videos

  • Imitation Learning and its Application to Natural Language Generation

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Feb 20, 2020
entry.content:
Evaluation

  • compare-mt (⭐468) - A tool for holistic analysis of language generations systems.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 17, 2020
entry.content:
Dialog

  • Plato (⭐983) - This is the Plato Research Dialogue System, a flexible platform for developing conversational AI agents.
  • RNNLG (⭐490) - RNNLG is an open source benchmark toolkit for Natural Language Generation (NLG) in spoken dialogue system application domains.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 11, 2020
entry.content:
Datasets

  • Alex Context NLG Dataset (⭐22) - A dataset for NLG in dialogue systems in the public transport information domain.
  • Box-score data (⭐113) - This dataset consists of (human-written) NBA basketball game summaries aligned with their corresponding box- and line-scores.
  • WeatherGov - Computer-generated weather forecasts from weather.gov (US public forecast), along with corresponding weather data.
  • WebNLG (⭐69) - The enriched version of the WebNLG - a resource for evaluating common NLG tasks, including Discourse Ordering, Lexicalization and Referring Expression Generation.
  • The Wikipedia company corpus - Company descriptions collected from Wikipedia. The dataset contains semantic representations, short, and long descriptions for 51K companies in English.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 06, 2020
entry.content:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • Texar (⭐2.4k) - Texar is a toolkit aiming to support a broad set of machine learning, especially natural language processing and text generation tasks.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 02, 2020
entry.content:
Datasets

  • Neural-Wikipedian (⭐10) - The repository contains the code along with the required corpora that were used in order to build a system that "learns" how to generate English biographies for Semantic Web triples.

Videos

  • Data-To-Text: Generating Textual Summaries of Complex Data - Ehud Reiter

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Dec 10, 2019
entry.content:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • PPLM (⭐1.1k) - Plug and Play Language Model implementation. Allows to steer topic and attributes of GPT-2 models.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Dec 07, 2019
entry.content:
Dialog

  • Chatito (⭐883) - Generate datasets for AI chatbots, NLP tasks, named entity recognition or text classification models using a simple DSL!

Neural Natural Language Generation

  • textgenrnn (⭐4.9k) - Easily train your own text-generating neural network of any size and complexity on any text dataset with a few lines of code.

Videos

  • Natural Language Generation (Introduction)
  • Strata Data Conference | The future of natural language generation: 2017-2027
  • The Quest for Automated Story Generation - Mark Riedl

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 25, 2019
entry.content:
Libraries

  • Cron Expression Descriptor (⭐1.1k) - A .NET library that converts cron expressions into human readable descriptions.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 23, 2019
entry.content:
Realizers

  • Genl (⭐21) - Surface realiser (part of a Natural Language Generation system) using Tree Adjoining Grammar.
  • JSrealB (⭐25) - A JavaScript bilingual text realizer for web development.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 12, 2019
entry.content:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • graph-2-text (⭐151) - Graph to sequence implemented in Pytorch combining Graph convolutional networks and opennmt-py.
  • Transformers (⭐147k) - State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and PyTorch.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 04, 2019
entry.content:
Datasets

  • E2E - This shared task focuses on recent end-to-end (E2E), data-driven NLG methods, which jointly learn sentence planning and surface realisation from non-aligned data.
  • YelpNLG - YelpNLG provides resources for natural language generation of restaurant reviews.

Evaluation

  • NLG-eval (⭐1.4k) - Evaluation code for various unsupervised automated metrics for Natural Language Generation.
  • VizSeq (⭐445) - A Visual Analysis Toolkit for Text Generation Tasks.

Grammar

  • GrammaticalFramework - A programming language for multilingual grammar applications.
  • CCGweb (⭐5) - A Web platform for parsing and annotation.

Narrative Generation

  • Tracery (⭐2.2k) - A story-grammar generation library for JavaScript.

Neural Natural Language Generation

  • Image Caption Generator (⭐146) - A Neural Network based generative model for captioning images using Tensorflow.
  • Summary Generation From Structured Data (⭐188) - For converting information present in the form of structured data into natural language text.

Products

  • Accelerated Text (⭐805) - Automatically generate multiple natural language descriptions of your data varying in wording and structure.
  • Twine - An open-source tool for telling interactive, nonlinear stories.

Realizers

  • SimpleNLG-EnFr (⭐25) - SimpleNLG-EnFr 1.1 is a bilingual English/French adaption of SimpleNLG v4.2.

Templating Languages

  • calyx (⭐63) - A Ruby library for generating text with recursive template grammars.
  • nalgene (⭐56) - Natural language generation language.
  • StringTemplate - Java template engine (with ports for C##, Objective-C, JavaScript, Scala) for generating source code, web pages, emails, or any other formatted text output.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 03, 2019
entry.content:
Grammar

  • CCG Lab (⭐28) - All combinators, common grammar format, parsing to logical form, parameter estimation for probabilistic CCG.

Narrative Generation

  • Random Story Generator (⭐63) - Using Natural Language Generation (NLG) to create a random short story.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Oct 29, 2019
entry.content:
Grammar

  • OpenCCG (⭐211) - OpenCCG library for parsing and realization with CCG.
  • EasyCCG (⭐59) - CCG: All combinators, common grammar format, parsing to logical form, parameter estimation for probabilistic CCG.

Realizers

  • SimpleNLG (⭐818) - Java API for Natural Language Generation.
  • SimpleNLG DE (⭐18) - German version of SimpleNLG 4.

entry.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Oct 22, 2019
entry.content:
Dialog

  • NNDIAL (⭐348) - NNDial is an open source toolkit for building end-to-end trainable task-oriented dialogue models.
  • TGen (⭐206) - Statistical NLG for spoken dialogue systems.
